titleStmt.title: This is to the clergy who are the men that goes about to settle religion (as they say) according to the Church of England, whether they may be bishops or presbyters, or what name soever they may go under.
titleStmt.author: Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702.

notesStmt.note: Signed M.F. Attributed by Wing to Margaret Fell.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
